channel.title: Showcase on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Showcase on nuaNce's blog

item.title: A Few of My Favorite Monospaced Fonts
item.description: I’ve always had a bit of an exaggerated font collection, most likely because I could never really decide on a single one. I do, however, have quite a few that I like more than others, here are some of them: Bergen Mono Roboto Mono Input Mono Apercu PT Mono Operator Mono Alma Mono JetBrains Mono Space Mono Overpass Mono Liberation Mono Bront IBM Plex Mono DM Mono DejaVu Sans Mono Source Code Pro

item.title: Cool Shell Scripts I've Found Handy
item.description: This post will most likely get updated as time goes by Vibe: I had used mpd and ncmpcpp for my music for a long time now, but decided to switch to mpv for the simplicity, and to make things even easier, I wrote this script, which shuffles all of the music files in the chosen directory and plays them in a terminal window, with album art in it’s own small, separate window.

item.title: Some of My Favorite Software
item.description: Just a list of some software I find nice to use: Software Description cfm Simple and fast terminal file manager maim Extremely powerful CLI screenshot tool SXIV “Simple X Image Viewer” giph Customizable and easy to use GIF recorder birch Freenode IRC client written in bash farge Finally a lightweight CLI colorpicker ungoogled-chromium Browse safely and privately, no compromises ST Simple Terminal shfm Terminal file browser written in bash epy Terminal based Ebook reader wpm Command line typing test cchat-gtk GTK+ frontend for cchat’s

item.title: My Linux Rices
item.description: Morning Coffee. Safe and Sound. Bloated Minimalism. Misty Mountain. Function > Form. Contempt. One With The Mountain. Is One Rose Enough? IceBerg. Attention to Detail. Bliss v1.5 Polka. GMK Dots. :bleedingeyes: Don’t Ask. Colors of Seoul Mediocre. A Night in Paris. Pop of Red. Bliss. Sans of Time. Clarity. Windows 98 Gloomy Nights. Warm and Sweet. Serenity.
